vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ἀβειληνή (T, Rec. Ἀβι-), -ῆς, ἡ, (sc. χώρα),
Abilene, a district in the Anti-Lebanon: Luk.3:1.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.shortDef: Abilene, a territory on the south end of the Ante-Lebanon mountain range, "[probably] "meadow"
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
§ Abilene, a territory on the south end of the Ante-Lebanon mountain range, "[probably] "meadow"
Abilene, a district of the Syrian Decapolis; from Abila, the chief town, Lk. 3:1*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞比利尼 这个專有地名在希伯來文的意思是 "茂盛的草地"
亞比拉城四周的地區,位於前黎巴嫩山脈南端,大馬色西北方,
由分封王呂撒聶治理 (路 3:1)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚比利尼这个专有地名在希伯来文的意思是"茂盛的草地"
亚比拉城四周的地区,位于前黎巴嫩山脉南端,大马色西北方,
由分封王吕撒聂治理(路3:1)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: A-by-len « Đồng cỏ », tên một xứ ở phía bắc nước Sy-ri. Xem A-bên G6
